name: BowerBirdSimulator
description:
Bowerbird Simulator is a 3d relaxing simulator game were you play as a bowerbird trying to build up its  nest. Explore the map for blue objects and bring them back to your nest. 

Keyboard Controls
WASD - Movement

Space - Fly

Shift - Bird Vision

Controller Controls

Joystick - Movement

A/X - Fly

Right Bumper - Bird Vision
